title: Not enough
creator_credit: Wim Van Der Velde, Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development and Ben Haanstra Film Productions
brief_description: About responsibility to developing countries. The apathy in rich countries is contrasted with the misery and toil of people in poor countries such as India who are attempting to develop their natural resources. Population growth is seen to be greater than increases in food production.
